item.description:
Hello world music lovers,

October just raced by but I managed to catch a fantastic show by Oliver Mtukudzi at the Somerville Theater as well as a great series of Afro-Brazilian dance workshops and performance by Olugunde at Brandeis.

Now at the end of November, Samba Tremeterra is playing on a Friday night (November 30) at Johnny Ds in Davis Square. They were supposed to play there last week but were cancelled due to the Red Sox games. So now you have a second chance to see them. And we can have a chance to get together before the show starts at 9:30pm. http://www.johnnyds.c...
item.name: Samba Tremeterra at Johnny D's November 30
